summary: Removes weight of item the player can have in mass
descriptionHtml:
Tired of having so many potions/soul gems/ingredients and food in your inventory That you don't have any more space for loot? Well this mod is for you.

It remove the weight of the items of the same category in different ".esp" files

FILES:
NoWeightFull Package :All potions,soul gems,food and ingredients have no weight [Comming Soon]
NoWeightSG: Remove the weight of all soul gems including Azura star and the Black Star
NoWeightPT: Remove the weight of all potions [Comming Soon]
NoWeightFD: Remove the weight of all food [Comming Soon]
NoWeightIN: Remove the weight of all ingredients [Comming Soon]
author: Alfatossa
